name: output_image_feature_probing_diffusers
description: Feature Probing via Diffusers — analyzes embedding differences between two prompts and generates images with selective dimension transfer. Returns image + per-dimension difference data.

prompt.description: Prompt A — base prompt for comparison

seed.description: Seed for reproducibility (same seed used for both original and modified)

output_mapping.description: Generated PNG image with embedding probing data in metadata

meta.notes: Encodes two prompts with the selected encoder (CLIP-L/CLIP-G/T5), computes per-dimension differences, and generates an image. In transfer mode, selected dimensions from prompt B are injected into prompt A's embedding before generation.
